Reviews.Title: 2 problems for S2
Reviews.Author: rahmanshek
Reviews.Content: The speaker and ringtone volume is so low. I can not even understand when someone calls me. Another problem is..... it is made for At&t; and my carrier is T-Mobile, so I can't get 4G network. All other applications are cool

Reviews.Title: Buy or don't buy
Reviews.Author: ShankarArjune
Reviews.Content: Not a bad product but the charger and the cable seems faulty and the phone has a button problem in just 2 weeks of usage. The menu button seems to not work and the menu pops up randomly and a lot. Overall..better off not buying

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy SII
Reviews.Author: Fily Llanos
Reviews.Content: elegi esta puntuacion es la correcta y lo recomendaria pa todo el mundo excelente producto llego a tiempo! Margarita, Venezuela!

Reviews.Title: My ideal phone
Reviews.Author: British
Reviews.Content: I got every kind of phone before even IPhones but trust me this is the best one for me?I recommended to everyone

ProductInfo.Features:
Android 2.3-powered smartphone with 1.5 GHz dual-core processor and 4.5-inch Super AMOLED Plus multi-touch display.
Runs on AT&T;'s expanding, ultra-fast 4G LTE connectivity (compatible with nationwide 4G HSPA+ network).
8-MP camera with Full HD 1080p video capture; 16 GB internal memory; microSD memroy expansion; Wirelss-N Wi-Fi networking (with optional Mobile Hotspot capabilities).
Up to 7 hours of talk time, up to 250 hours (10.4 days) of standby time; released in November, 2011.
What's in the Box: handset, rechargeable battery, charger, USB cable, wired stereo headset, quick start guide.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy S II Skyrocket 4G Android Unlocked Cell Phone (Black) GSM BANDS 1,2,5&6
